Author: LowCalPal
Text: This is really helpful, thank you

Author: tigerchik
Text: in the book Brain Over Binge, the author (forgot her name) tried Topamax and I think she found that helpful for reducing bingeing (in addition to treating it as an addiction and basically doing CBT on herself about reminding herself that thinking doesn't have to be black and white, etc). You might get that book and bring it with you... I think also maybe say exactly what you said here: you know it's ultimately about finding 'stuff to do aside from b/p' but saying that alone is NOT enough to solve the problem, and you need more help unpacking what's causing it etc, and would like a referral to outpatient
